name: 22alpha-hydroxy-5alpha-campestan-3-one,[reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase]:oxygen oxidoreductase (C-23-hydroxylating)
definition: 22alpha-Hydroxy-5alpha-campestan-3-one + [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + Oxygen <=> 3-Dehydro-6-deoxoteasterone + [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + H2O
